statements: SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM team_employees;
SELECT * FROM team_employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_team, COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM team_employees GROUP BY employee_team;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM team_employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM team_employees WHERE employee_team = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM team_employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM team_employees WHERE employee_team = 'Engineering' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM team_employees;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_team FROM team_employees ORDER BY employee_team;
SELECT * FROM team_employees WHERE employee_name LIKE 'S%' AND employee_email LIKE '%@company.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, role FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, location FROM teams WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT team_name, description FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, role FROM employees WHERE employee_id > 100 AND role LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, description, location FROM teams WHERE team_id IN (2, 4, 6) AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT first_name AS 'First Name', last_name AS 'Last Name', email AS 'Email', role AS 'Role' FROM employees WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, UPPER(role) AS role FROM employees WHERE role IN ('Developer', 'Engineer') ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE role = 'Developer' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT email FROM employees WHERE role = 'Analyst' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE location = 'New York' AND team_name LIKE 'Tech%';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, location FROM teams;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, role FROM employees WHERE role='Manager';
SELECT team_name, first_name, last_name FROM teams JOIN team_assignments ON teams.team_id = team_assignments.team_id JOIN employees ON team_assignments.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, email FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT team_name, employee_name FROM teams INNER JOIN employee_teams ON teams.team_id = employee_teams.team_id;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE role = 'Developer' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, email FROM employees WHERE role='Manager';
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE employee_id=101;
SELECT employee_name, email FROM employees WHERE role='Developer' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees JOIN employee_teams ON employees.employee_id = employee_teams.employee_id WHERE team_id=1;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, role FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM employees ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE team_name LIKE 'T%';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT team_name, first_name, last_name FROM teams JOIN team_members ON teams.team_id = team_members.team_id JOIN employees ON team_members.employee_id = employees.employee_id;

SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM departments JOIN department_managers ON departments.department_id = department_managers.department_id JOIN employees ON department_managers.employee_id = employees.employee_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT employee_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, phone_number FROM employees WHERE email LIKE '%example.com' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
